comment.text: "Client secret reset message displayed after successful reset action in a Reset Dialog component."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Успешно тайно клиентско нулиране' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Client secret reset successfully'. 'Тайно' (secret) is redundant as 'client' already implies secrecy. 'Нулиране' while meaning 'reset', sounds a little clunky in this context.
While not strictly incorrect, the structure of 'Успешно ресетване на клиентски секрет' aligns better with common Bulgarian phrasing for technical notifications.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed if 'Успешно тайно клиентско нулиране' is preferred, but 'Успешно ресетване на клиентски секрет' is better.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Հաճախորդի գաղտնի բանալին հաջողությամբ վերականգնվեց" (Hach'axordi gagtnի banalĭn hаstoghut'yamb verakanvnec') translates more closely to 'Client secret key was successfully restored' rather than 'Client secret reset successfully'. While 'restored' and 'reset' can be synonymous, 'reset' is the more accurate term in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Հաճախորդի գաղտնի բանալին հաջողությամբ ջնջվեց եւ վերաբացվեց (Hach'axordi gagtnи banalĭn hаstoghut'yamb dznjvnec yev verabavnev).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ຄວາມລັບຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້ໄດ້ຖືກຣີເຊັດຢ່າງສໍາເລັດແລ້ວ" literally translates to 'The user's secret has been reset successfully'. While understandable, it's not as precise as 'Client secret reset successfully'. It mixes 'user' and 'client' which are different concepts in OAuth.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄວາມລັບຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້ໂອນອັດຕະໂນມັດໄດ້ຮັບການຣີເຊັດຢ່າງສໍາເລັດແລ້ວ (Khom lab khong phu chai non attoman dai rap kan reset yang samret laeo) -  This translates more closely to 'The client secret has been reset successfully'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'este resetară' is grammatically incorrect. The correct form should be 'a fost resetată' to indicate a completed action in the past.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cheia secretă a clientului a fost resetată cu succes

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පාරිභෝගික' (pāribhōgika) is a more formal word for 'customer'. In this context, 'පාරිශුරාවක' (pārišurāvaka) might be more natural and common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පාරිශුරාවක රහසය සාර්ථකව නැවත සකසන ලදි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, the sentence structure 'සාර්ථකව නැවත සකසන ලදි' (sārthakava nāvathava sakasana ladhi) is a bit passive and formal. A more active construction could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පාරිශුරාවක රහසය සාර්ථකව නැවත සකසන ලදී.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Тајни' (Tajni) should be 'Тајна' (Tajna). It's in the feminine singular nominative case to agree with 'кључ' (ključ - key).
